backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no behavior.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report listing files and components related to implementing default-on maintenance mode.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and global background/text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app that toggles between maintenance screen and full marketing site based on MAINTENANCE_MODE.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Main: Centered full-page message indicating the site is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Card.t: Reusable styled card container with border, padding, and hover shadow.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Form with client-side validation, simulated submission, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with logo, contact info placeholders, and copyright line.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Sticky header with navigation, active section tracking, smooth scroll, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Generic section wrapper with spacing and scroll margin.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: About section with bio text, highlights list, and photo placeholder box.
Displays a grid of 12 color placeholders with note inputs using local state.
Renders a contact section with email, placeholders for phone and location, and an embedded contact form.
Provides a hero banner with headline text and buttons that smoothly scroll to other sections.
Shows a four-step process with icons and descriptions laid out in a responsive grid.
Simple services section describing Chaniya Choli offerings.
Empty file intended for a testimonials section.
frontend/src/config/maintenance.ts: Defines a site-wide maintenance mode flag currently set to true.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining color variables, typography, theming, and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, design notes, and a list of existing features for a minimalistic marketing website for the Vandan brand, including theme requirements and section structure. It outlines color palette decisions, an About-section photo placeholder, and no known issues.
